targets.query:
from(bucket: "pac2200")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "meter_counter" and contains(value: r._field, set: ["energy_active_import_phase_1", "energy_active_import_phase_2", "energy_active_import_phase_3"]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> rename(columns: {_field: "phase", _value: "(COUNTER)"})

from(bucket: "pac2200")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "meter_counter" and r._field == "energy_active_import_total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> rename(columns: {_field: "phase", _value: "(COUNTER)"})

from(bucket: "pac2200")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
